name: The Grate Machine
description:
Place stuff and build a machine which makes grated cheese!

Buttons: 

1: Conveyor belt

2: Shipping box

3: Cow field

4: Milking Parlour

5: Cheese Grater

Backspace: Delete tool

Enter: Place Machine / Delete

Milk turns into cheese after a while.

The direction the machine will move stuff might be confusing but you can delete a machine and replace it if you mess up.

Sorry it's awful, no excuse :D

Made in rust using Bevy engine. Go Bevy!
